column5: this isgonna be a good show and some great speakers and seminars!! for anyone looking for info on walleye fishing, i would strongly suggest checking out the Walleye Academy with Bob Devine of chartertalk guide service, Grant McCallister of G2 and Sheldon Hatch of Ezelo Walleye Adventures. They will be covering all aspects of walleye fishing. If u ever wanted to know how to troll for walleye, jig them up, get them through the ice... this is the seminar to see! it will be held on the Sufix stage, friday at 3:30, saturday, sunday and monday all at 1:45pm.  hope to see lots of guys out at the show this weekend!
